metadata.synopsis: A Jewish boy (Haley Joel Osment) finds shelter with a priest (Willem Dafoe) and a family of peasants after the Nazis invade Poland.

reviews: ...remains an almost painfully dull piece of work throughout most of its interminable running time...
...a gutsy little film that dares to show us an intimate, child's point of view on the horrific events of Europe during World War II.
